entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [6.0.1xx-RC1] Add platform support to workload pack records #20202
  • dotnet pack command results in the loss of digital signature #20197
  • .NET stack temporary folder cannot be accessed after running under sudo #20195
  • "dotnet build-server shutdown" equivalent for SharedCompilationId and -pipename? #20183
  • String interpolation errors when concatenating multiple string #20178

Closed

  • Create a single bundle for x86 and x64 windows installer #5237
    5.0.1xx
  • dotnet run: application exception causes "dotnet has stopped working" error dialog #6707
    5.0.1xx
  • WhenToolAssetsFileIsInUseThenCLIRetriesLaunchingTheCommandForAtLeastOneSecond test is flaky #8002
    5.0.1xx
  • Help is wrong for some commands #9181
    5.0.1xx
  • Disable building/running test in official build of sdk in 5.0 #10771
  • .NET Core SDK 3.1.300-preview-015048 breaks build with multi targeting #10905
  • Update NETSDK1130 error to recommend installing CSWinRT NuGet package #13268
    5.0.1xx
  • /Users/USERNAME/.dotnet/sdk-advertising-temp/ cannot be accessed #19523
    6.0.1xx
  • dotnet workload install creates .nuget with root permissions in clean env #19823
    6.0.1xx
  • Workload repair without any installed workloads should be a no-op #20092
    6.0.1xx
  • Can't find System.Private.DataSerialization.resources #20189
  • Unable to reference Net5.0 C# project from Net5.0 C++ project #20002
    Discussion

PullRequests

Created

  • Update global.json #20212
  • Prkrishn/add tests #20209
    Area-DotNet Test
  • Add VisualStudioComponentIds metadata for suggested workloads #20200
    Area-Workloads

Merged

  • Fix missing packaged shim after update #20199
    Area-Workloads
  • Do not show help on internal workload error #20163
    Area-Workloads
  • Add sudo home override #20196
    Area-Workloads
  • [RC1] port [Package Validation] resolve references when running API Compat #20152
    Servicing-approved, Area-Compatibility
  • [Release/6.0.1xx-rc1] Dispose Open handle on the produced package #20156
    Servicing-approved, Area-Compatibility
  • [release/6.0.1xx-rc1] Avoid signing and generating unnecessary packages #20082
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Adding sdk check config file #19904
    source-build, Area-CLI
  • Improve command output for no op workload repair #20164
    Area-Workloads

Updated

  • Update a bunch of test projects to the current target framework #20148
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [WIP] Support installing workloads in user folder #18823
    Area-Workloads
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Arch-independent support for `dotnet run` #20102
    Area-External, Servicing-approved
  • Project Reference support for WinRT Components #20153
    Area-External, Servicing-approved
